name: General Description
content:
This cookie tool will help you understand who uses cookies to collect information from your device, what the information is used for, and how you can manage the use of cookies for non-essential activities.

Xflick supports the Self-Regulatory Principles for Online Behavioral Advertising of the Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA), the Digital Advertising Alliance of Canada (DAAC) and the European Interactive Digital Advertising Alliance (EDAA).

If you decline the use of advertising cookies, you will still be able to see Xflick advertising on other sites, but such advertising will not be personalized by us or our service providers to you, and we will continue to send you personalized offers when using our website based on information from cookies that you have not opted out of.

Alternatively, you can set your browser`s privacy settings to prevent your browser from accepting new cookies, to notify you when you receive a new cookie, or to turn off all cookies. If your browser is set to not accept cookies, you will not be shown interest-based advertising, but your use of the Xflick service may be difficult or impossible. In addition, if you opt out of certain cookies using our cookie selection tool, your preferences will be stored by storing a cookie on your device. Therefore, it is important that your browser accepts cookies, otherwise your settings will not be applied. If you delete or clear your cookies, or if you change the web browser you are using, you will need to set your cookie settings again.

For more information about our use of cookies, please see the Cookies and Online Advertising section of our Privacy Statement.

name: Essential Cookies
content:
These cookies are essential for the operation of our website or online services. For example, we and our Service Providers may use these cookies to authenticate and identify visitors when they use our websites and applications so that we can provide services to them. They also help us enforce our Terms of Use, prevent fraudulent activity, and keep our services secure.

Duration: Most cookies last for one session (they are active only until you close your browser) or for 24 hours. Some cookies remain active for a longer period of time: from 3 to 12 months. Cookies, which are used to prevent fraudulent activity and ensure the security of our services, remain active for a maximum of 24 months.

name: Own cookies for performance and functionality
content:
These cookies help us improve and personalize your Xflick online experience. For example, they allow us to remember your preferences and eliminate the need to re-enter information you previously provided (for example, during user registration). We also use these cookies to collect information (such as popular pages, conversion rates, browsing habits, clicks and other information) about our visitors use of the Xflick service. This allows us to improve and personalize our website and service, as well as conduct market research. Deleting these types of cookies may limit the functionality of our service.

Duration: Most cookies are active only for 24 hours. Some cookies remain active for a longer period of time: from 3 to 12 months.

name: Third party cookies for performance and functionality
content: Third-party cookies help us improve and personalize your Netflix online experience. Cookies in this category are only used by Tudum (our official site for Netflix fans). They help us show you content hosted by third parties, such as content from social networks. To learn more about how third parties use such cookies, please see the privacy information on the third party's website. Deleting these types of cookies may limit the functionality of our service.

name: Advertising cookies
content: These cookies use information about your interactions with this and other websites and apps, and your response to advertisements and emails to show you more relevant advertising and for analytics and optimization purposes. These types of ads are called ''personalized ads'' and are displayed outside of the Netflix domain. Netflix has contractual and technical measures designed to prevent advertising partners from accessing information about the content you select, the URLs of sites you visit, or the movies and TV shows you watch through our service. We do not share information about the content you choose or the films and TV series you watch using our service. The advertising cookies associated with our service belong to the advertising partners listed in our detailed cookie information. Select your preferences for advertising cookies below. If you would like to opt out of advertising cookies across all websites, please go here.
